short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for generating secure passwords with history and dark mode support.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Secure Password Generator & Manager is a Chrome extension that helps you create strong, unique passwords to enhance your online security. The extension offers several customization options for password generation, such as setting password length, including/excluding specific character types, and avoiding certain characters.

With built-in password history, you can view and easily copy your recently generated passwords. The extension also supports optional dark mode for a more comfortable user experience, as well as an optional master password to protect access to the password history.

Support the development by visiting our 'Buy Me a Coffee' page directly from the extension's settings.
